<h4 class="mb-2" style="font-size:1.2rem;">Santa Ynez Watershed Report</h4>
<p class="mb-3" style="font-size:0.98rem;">
I conducted a hydrologic analysis of the Santa Ynez River Watershed using HAWQS modeling to evaluate discharge under varying climate conditions (RCP 4.5 and RCP 8.5). I also designed detailed maps using ArcGIS to visualize watershed dynamics, including topography, soil characteristics, and land use distribution.
</p>
